page.title: 16A working mother in Guiness.
page.content:
A day in the life of a working mother.
She will rise at about 7.00 a.m.and cook a family breakfast.She will then prepare her children for school,and be ready to leave for her own place of employment at about 8.00 a.m. She will return home at around 5.30 p.m.,cook a family meal,and do some light housework.The heavy cleaning tasks being performed at the weekends. She will spend a little time with her children,checking homework and discussing the days events. After the children go to bed,she may get a few minutes to relax before going to bed herself about 11.00 p.m.
